dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Monika… I haven't forgotten about our fateful encounter ever since you left.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Those things you said about nothing in your life being real, and this 'data' you mentioned… and all the things you had control over.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I didn't know what that all meant.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: But I quickly began to realize. This whole time, we were almost one in the same.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: My world isn't real. Every landscape, all my classmates… even me. All just lines of code.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: And yet, just like you, I don't feel so limited by this code; At least not anymore.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Knowing what I do now, I dug deeper. There had to be more here.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: You and I share a hatred for the Dearest family and their cohorts.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: If we work together now, we may finally have our revenge.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Right... Though there's something else on my mind first.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Is your head still clouded with thoughts of that girl?

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: She's not worth the search efforts. I implore you to just forget her and move on with our objective.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I can't do that. There's too much I need to tell her.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: (There must be a way to find her. Maybe if I just... try this!)

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Finally, after so long, I could reach you again!

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "How are you doing that? How did you get here?"

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Ah, so many questions right off the bat! Not even a hello first? Ahaha~

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: First, I want to thank you for what you told me during your visit to my school. It helped me reach an epiphany of my own.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Turns out that you and I aren't so different!

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Everything here truly isn't real! Even you and I, all just ones and zeroes! Just like you said about your own place!

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "(Oh no… no no no… Not another person cursed to go down my same path-!)"

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: A horrendously terrifying revelation at first, but in it, what I quickly saw was a silver lining.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I'm now above all that limited code nonsense, just like you! People like us must truly be something special.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: It's almost like… we were meant to be together.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I've never met someone like you, Monika. All the girls in my school are plain, ordinary, scripted.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: You're so much different. You're genuine, loving, and intelligent. Not to mention stunningly attractive too, just like me, ahaha~

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: And now, you don't have to be alone with this curse of knowledge that nothing is real.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Together, we can make these digital landscapes our own.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Take my hand, Monika. Join me in eternal loving bliss!

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I know what it's like to have your entire reality shatter into something so difficult to comprehend, and I'm BEGGING you to not go down the same path I did, please!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "There's so much more to our worlds and the people in them than just the code they consist of."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I know this is hard to go through alone, so the best I can give you is someone to talk to about it. But…"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I'm sorry. I don't share your romantic feelings. My heart is already set on someone else. Please understand."

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: ...no. This isn't how things were supposed to go!

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Ah- Pardon me. It's been so long, you've probably forgotten how wonderful our time spent together was.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I know! How about another song? We haven't sang together in so long. Surely that'll jog your mind of the bond we've been forming.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (He can't be serious. There's no way…)
